title: Need a new Canary. Names?
body:
Last one was named Scylla (RIP 2003-2014) , what should I name this one? Was thinking of Taliyah / Katara for females and Progress / Holiday for males.

Reference: This isnt the bird I'm buying, but for those who don't know whata  red canary looks like.
http://img.birdsnow.com/slir/w1200/birds/data/photos/488909_2.jpg%3F1444169417
